Package org.apache.lenya.cms.usecase

Interface Summary
Operation Operation interface.
UnitOfWork This is a "Unit of Work" object (see "Unit of Work" pattern by Martin Fowler).
Usecase Usecase interface.
UsecaseResolver Usecase resolver interface.
 

Class Summary
AbstractOperation Abstract operation implementation.
AbstractUsecase Abstract usecase implementation.
DocumentUsecase Extends AbstractUsecase with document helper methods.
UnitOfWorkImpl Abstract base class for operations on documents.
UsecaseResolverImpl Usecase resolver implementation.
WorkflowUsecase  
 

Exception Summary
UsecaseException Usecase exception.
